title: Zombie Apocalypse Diaries: Outbreak
description: What would you do if the “Zombie Apocalypse” started happening all around you?How would you react? Where would you go? Who would you help and who would you fight?When the lights go out, the fires start burning, and the undead start moaning – everything you think you knew about life changes in an instant.Follow the struggles of everyday people – just like you – who face the end of the world as the zombie apocalypse unfolds in front of their eyes.Read their journals as they detail the life and death struggles we all will face when the dead rise to walk among us.Feel the pain as a small town waitress watches helplessly as her boyfriend is attacked right across the street from her diner.Smell the blood and gore as National Guard soldiers make a last ditch stand against an endless horde of zombie killers.Cry along with a little girl clutching her toy rabbit as she waits for her mom to come home, but knowing she never will.Zombie Apocalypse Diaries makes the zombie apocalypse startlingly real in a way that will leave you haunted by bringing the victims’ stories to light in very personal, and often tragic, detail.Grab your copy now and get ready for the ride of your life!
author: J. Scott Edwards
